LanguageData.FALCFF.EnableModDesc: If this mod is causing problems, please log a bug and disable it from here untill an update is available, so as to preserve your settings.
LanguageData.FALCFF.ShowTargetingOverlayDesc: When manually targeting a ranged weapon, highlight all tiles the projectile could pass through, accounting for miss radius.
LanguageData.FALCFF.ProtectPetsDesc: Protect trained animals with an assigned master, the same way colonists are protected.
LanguageData.FALCFF.ProtectColonyAnimalsDesc: Protect all tame animals belonging to the colony. May cause performance issues on lower end machines with large numbers of livestock.
LanguageData.FALCFF.IgnoreShieldedPawns: Ignore pawns with active shield belts
LanguageData.FALCFF.IgnoreShieldedPawnsDesc: Shooters will not worry about pawns wearing a shield belt with at least 10% power standing in the line of fire.
LanguageData.FALCFF.EnableWhenUndraftedDesc: If you tend to disable the 'Avoid Friendly Fire' setting on pawns during combat, using this option will ensure it is always turned back on again when they are undrafted.
